Strava Analytics Widgets

Embeddable widgets for your personal website

Stats Card Widget

Displays comprehensive running statistics including all-time totals and year-over-year comparisons.

<div id="strava-stats"></div>
<script src="https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/stats-card.iife.js"></script>
<script>
  window.StatsCard.init('strava-stats', {
    dataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/stats/all-time-totals.json',
    options: {
      showTitle: true,
      secondaryDataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/stats/year-over-year.json'
    }
  });
</script>

Comparison Chart Widget

Interactive bar chart comparing running statistics across different time periods with multiple visualization options.

<div id="strava-chart"></div>
<script src="https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/comparison-chart.iife.js"></script>
<script>
  window.ComparisonChart.init('strava-chart', {
    dataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/stats/year-over-year.json',
    options: {
      showTitle: true,
      secondaryDataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/stats/seasonal-trends.json'
    }
  });
</script>

Streak Widget

Visualizes running streaks and activity patterns with time-of-day radar chart and monthly heatmap.

<script>
  window.StreakWidget.init('strava-streak', {
    dataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/stats/streaks.json',
    options: {
      showTitle: true,
      secondaryDataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/stats/time-of-day.json'
    }
  });
</script>

Geographic Statistics Widget

Displays country and city running rankings with distance data, run counts, and CSV export.

<div id="strava-geo"></div>
<script src="https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/geo-stats-widget.iife.js"></script>
<script>
  window.GeoStatsWidget.init('strava-geo', {
    dataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/geo/countries.json',
    options: {
      showTitle: true,
      secondaryDataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/geo/cities.json',
      metadataUrl: 'https://bacilo.github.io/strava-widgets/data/geo/geo-metadata.json'
    }
  });
</script>
